name: Teo Turtle saves the zoo
description:
Do you remember the good old Hugo PC game? Teo Turtle is based on this game principle. Teo moves in a good 2D manner in the form of a sidescroller. In doing so, it has to dodge or jump over many obstacles. 

Story:

An alien captures all animals in a zoo to explore them. When an animal has been explored, it is dropped off somewhere. That's where Teo comes in and starts searching for the abandoned animals and brings them back to the zoo.

In total there are 18 animals that have to be brought back to the zoo. In the process Teo encounters

- flying enemies

- objects that he must destroy

- thorny obstacles

- jumping platforms

- moving planes

- rocket boots

- and much more
